{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

save_notebook_history[source]

save_notebook_history(path, verbose=True)

Save current notebook history to path

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
save_notebook_history('tmp/my_history.ipynb')

Notebook history saved to tmp/my_history.ipynb
{% endraw %}
